title: Interpretation of a dream about washing carpets in a dream

preview.html: Seeing people washing carpets with him is a sign that he will make new friends in a short time. Interpretation of seeing carpet washing in a dream for a single girl It also indicates that washing carpets in a dream for a single woman is an indication of an increase in the work she does in her life. While she was working hard to clean the carpets This was a sign of profit and profits from her business that would soon be achieved. An unmarried girl who washes a lot of carpets indicates that she is getting close to people who do good for her. The picture shows a single woman washing carpets with her friends, declaring that a lot is happening in her life. It is considered Seeing single women washing folded carpets is a sign that she will make important decisions for her quickly. If a single woman washes a lot of carpets, this indicates that she will fall into many trials in her life. Seeing her washing carpets with her fiancé is interpreted by the preparations they make It is currently in it. It appears that cleaning the carpet in a dream from dust is a sign of the end of worries and problems. It indicates that washing clean carpets is evidence that there is someone close to her in distress who helps her. See also: Washing dishes in a dream. Interpretation of watching carpet washing in a dream for a married woman. Washing carpets in a dream For a married woman, it indicates an improvement in her situation and a change for the better. If she washes carpets with her husband in a dream, this indicates the happy life she lives with him. Seeing carpets washed and folded is interpreted by naive decisions. A married woman who washes a lot of carpets in a dream shows her preoccupation with her life and affairs. If he cleans the carpet more than once, this is a big problem. A married woman who tries to clean the carpet but does not clean it indicates a problem that she cannot solve. He explained that washing dirty carpets indicates cleaning her life of problems and their consequences. As for a married woman who seeks to wash the carpets, she shows her fear. On the lives and circumstances of her children. Interpretation of seeing carpet washing in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman washing carpets in a dream indicates the end of the problems she is currently experiencing. Seeing a divorced woman living a calm and consequence-free life washing carpets. It indicates that the divorced woman who is looking forward to washing carpets will find Comfort and her pursuit. It indicates that the divorced woman washing the folded rug has made unhealthy decisions about her life. It also explains that washing the carpets in the dream indicates the tiring life that she sees and lives. Either the divorced woman trying to clean the carpets is evidence of cleaning her life of problems. If the carpet is Dirty and not easy to clean, this indicates problems that she often faces in her life. It is clear that a divorced woman washing carpets in a dream is a sign of the bad life she lives. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about washing clothes for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream about washing carpets for a man and its meaning. Seeing a man washing carpets in a dream indicates To the problems he is trying to get rid of. The man who cleaned the carpets well and was handsome is a sign of the beautiful life he lived. If he cleans the carpets from...

title: Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman: The horse is an animal that has many human uses. It is one of the most widely used pets for humans and has great strength and speed. It is one of the animals used in competitions. It participates in international and local competitions and is famous for its prowess and strength in running. Many horse lovers see it in their dreams and are curious to know the meaning of this vision, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Seeing a horse in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of pride. And dignity, as well as the high position that an unmarried woman will reach in reality. It is also a sign of her ability to achieve and reach higher and higher homes. In some cases, a lone horse in a dream is evidence that it has the same qualities that it possesses in reality. Perhaps it indicates Seeing a horse riding in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s dreams and desires will come true. A wounded horse in a dream is a sign of obstacles that an unmarried woman will face, which she will have to be patient in solving so that she can cross them safely. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream according to the interpretation of NabulsiSeeing an unmarried girl Riding a horse in a dream is good news for her that she will marry a good and pious man, and it is also evidence of the happiness and stability with which she will live in life. Al-Nabulsi claims that since the horse is a symbol of strength and originality, seeing an unmarried woman riding a horse in a dream is a sign of marrying someone It has the same characteristics as a horse in reality. The interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation. Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation differs from Al-Nabulsi’s dream about horses, as seeing horses in a single girl’s dream is evidence that the girl will fall into many sins and misdeeds, which will affect her reputation and honor in reality. God forbid. Ibn Shaheen describes the dream in detail, saying: If an unmarried woman rides a white horse, her dream is evidence of her stability and happiness with a generous, pious man who respects God Almighty’s right to her and has a great deal of justice. And piety. Receiving a horse as a gift in a dream is a sign of the abundance of money that the dreamer will earn in his life. As for seeing a brown horse in a dream, it is a sign of marriage to a person who has great wealth, high status, and great wealth. It is also an indication of the wonderful success and excellence that the girl will achieve in her academic life. As for the death of a horse in a dream for a single girl, it does not bode well, as it is a sign of the worries and sorrow that will accumulate on her in reality. It is also considered evidence of the end of her romantic relationship, God forbid. In conclusion, it is mentioned that all the previous interpretations are nothing but signs or images that the subconscious mind brought back at the time of sleep in the form of dreams, because of their excessive thinking or because of the large number of those interpretations that I saw in reality. reality.

title: Death of a cow in a dream

preview.html: This depends on the connotations and interpretations that the vision carries, depending on whether the fortuneteller is married, a single mother, a single mother, or a married mother. Death of a cow in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a dead cow on the dreamer’s path is evidence of the many hardships and punishments that the dreamer faces in his life. Also Seeing a dead cow indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to disasters, misfortunes, and problems that he will face in his life. If the dreamer sees the slaughter of a cow in his dream, this is a sign of abundant nutrition and the abundance that he will obtain. If the fortuneteller sees cutting dead cows, this is a sign of gossip, gossip, and insulting others. The death of a cow in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried girl dreams of a dead cow, this is a sign of her failure and she feels sad. If an unmarried woman dreams of a slaughtered cow, this is good news about an engagement near a person who makes her happy and loves her. Seeing a dead cow in an unmarried girl’s home is evidence of her condition. The bad psychological state that she is exposed to due to a failed love story. If a girl sees that she is deliberately killing a cow in her dream, this is good news for the fulfillment of her dreams and desires. If an unmarried girl dreams of a cow that has died and is sick, this indicates envy. You may be interested in: Escaping from a cow in a dream. Death of a cow In a dream for a married woman: When a married woman sees a dead cow in her dream, this indicates sadness and problems. Seeing a white cow being slaughtered in a woman’s dream is good news for her that she is hearing good and happy news. The vision also shows marital happiness by living with her husband, but if the married woman sees herself A white cow is slaughtered, it indicates marital strife. If a woman sees a large dead cow in her dream, this is a sign that family members will put their lives in danger. Seeing the blood of a dead cow is news for a woman that problems and disputes will be resolved, and if she is in debt, this vision indicates the repayment of the debt. However, if a married woman suffers from a disease and sees cow blood in her dream, this is a sign of the dreamer’s recovery from diseases. The death of a cow in a dream for a pregnant woman. If the pregnant woman sees that she is slaughtering the cow and eating its body, this is evidence of the imminence of her birth. If a woman sees a dead cow in a dream, but it is far from Therefore, it means that she will face difficulties and problems at the time of birth, but the newborn will be fine. Death of a cow in a dream for a manWhen a man sees a dead cow in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is a fanatical and reckless person. The vision also indicates the dreamer’s inability to make decisions and take responsibility for Same. Seeing a dead cow on the road in the dreamer’s dream is evidence that his life will change for the worse and he will face many consequences and problems. Watching the slaughter of a cow and sacrificing it is evidence of the dreamer’s imminent journey and the fulfillment of his desires and dreams. And if the dreamer is working in a job and sees that he is slaughtering a cow and sacrificing it, then this A sign of his promotion. If the dreamer is a merchant and sees the slaughter of a cow and its sacrifice, then this is good news for the dreamer of the success of his business and the abundant and abundant profit he will earn. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a raging cow that wants to be a butt for a married and single woman. Death of a cow in a dream

title: Interpretation of eating chicken in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of eating chicken in a dream by Ibn SirinAccording to the interpretation of the great scholar Ibn Sirin, seeing and eating chicken in a dream is one of the happy dreams that portend goodness, so it is a sign for the dreamer that he is fine. Seeing fried or grilled chicken indicates money and livelihood, but it requires effort on the part of The owner of the vision. Whoever sees that he is eating raw chicken, this is evidence that he mocks people and seeks gossip. Seeing yourself eating chicken breasts in a dream indicates an opportunity to work or travel. As for seeing a chicken leg, it is a sign of stability in marital life. And when you see yourself eating a chicken leg Chicken: This is a sign of traveling and leaving the country. This vision portends new beginnings. Interpretation of a dream about seeing chicken in a dream. Seeing a chicken in a dream with chicks is undesirable, as this is evidence of a loss or deterioration in the fortuneteller’s life. It also portends the bad consequences of some actions committed by the fortuneteller. in his life. Many chickens indicate the number of many children. Interpretation of seeing a live chicken in a dream When you see a live chicken in a dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is dealing with life affairs related to money, livelihood and sustenance. If the dreamer sees himself running and chasing chickens in a dream, this indicates That the dreamer seeks to earn a living. When you catch chickens, this is a sign of gaining great wealth. When he sees a white and large fat chicken, this is a good omen for the fortuneteller, because it indicates a beautiful woman, while a skinny black chicken indicates a barren woman. When you hear the sound of chickens in a dream This is a sign of waste. Buying and selling chicken in a dream. If you see yourself buying chicken in a dream, this means good luck and success in work and life in general. Seeing selling chicken in a man’s dream indicates waste and excessive spending of money incorrectly, while in a woman’s dream it appears Her shortcomings in managing her household affairs and not caring enough for her children. Interpretation of seeing a chicken in a woman’s dream: Seeing cooked chicken in a married woman’s dream indicates her stability in her married life and portends good news. If you see a cooked chicken in a pregnant woman’s dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a boy. And cooked chicken In an unmarried girl's dream it can herald her imminent marriage and also indicate that she will achieve stability in her love life.

title: Interpretation of seeing pants in a dream for a married and single woman

preview.html: The interpretation of this dream must determine the social status of the fortuneteller, because the pants in an unmarried woman’s dream have a special interpretation, as well as for a married woman. Interpretation of the view of the pants by Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees in a dream that he is putting on his pants backwards, this is evidence of committing sins and transgressions. Whoever sees that he is taking them off His pants in a dream are a sign of failure and failure to achieve his desires. Long pants in a dream indicate protection and health. Seeing pants in a dream is a sign of a trip to Europe. Seeing pants with an elastic band worn in a man’s dream means that his wife will give birth to twins. From Dreaming of cutting off the tape of his pants, this is an indication of the presence of an enemy who hates him from within the family. If the pants appear inside the dream without a shirt, this is a sign of poverty. Seeing defecation in pants is a sign of kindness and adequate nutrition. If a person wears pants in a dream while they are open, this is a sign of morality Bad. Interpretation of pants for a single womanSingle: When you see pants in a dream, this means concealment, kindness, and piety, as it will be an indication of marriage. Tight pants show the fears that the girl is falling into. Colored pants in a dream are unrelated. They indicate humility and happiness. Seeing jeans in a dream means unpleasant news. And this is not good. Whoever sees in a dream that he is buying new pants, this is a sign of marriage. If an unmarried woman sees that she is wearing dirty pants, this indicates anxiety. If she sees that she is washing her pants, this is a sign of a new life coming to her. If she sees that she is washing her pants, this is a sign of a new life coming to her. By sewing pants, this is a sign that he will get rid of the difficulties he is going through. Interpretation of seeing pants for a pregnant woman When she sees a dream, pants are a sign of power and control. Pants in a pregnant woman’s dream indicate goodness and blessings, especially if they are loose and baggy. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing pants with a belt means The abundance of money that you will have after giving birth. If the pants are yellow, this indicates illness and poverty. Interpretation of seeing pants for a married woman. If a married woman sees a store full of pants, it is a sign of good luck. If she sees that she is wearing new pants and bought them with her husband, this will be abundance for her. A married woman wearing red pants in a dream is a sign of imminent pregnancy. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will answer it and explain it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about beating a chicken

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about hitting a chicken in a dream. Some may search for an interpretation of a dream about hitting a chicken in a dream, and we find that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know an interpretation for. By heart, the interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream about beating a chicken in a dream. In the case of my personal opinion, that the chicken is clucking, then this may be an indication of the happy events that will come to the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Seeing a chicken clucking in a dream may indicate the anxiety that the dreamer is suffering from and that it will He will be relieved of it during this time, thanks to God. Seeing a chicken attacking the dreamer in a dream is evidence of the distress that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. Seeing a chicken clucking in a dream may indicate changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during these days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about beating my grandmother in a dream: Beating my grandmother in a dream may indicate the large amount of money that the dreamer gets during this period. It is possible that seeing the grandmother being beaten in a dream indicates the blessings and goodness that the dreamer will receive during this time, and God knows best. Seeing the grandmother being beaten may indicate In a dream, happy events will come to the dreamer in his life during this period. Anyone who sees in his dream that he was beating his grandmother could indicate the abundance of money that the dreamer is obtaining at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of beating a cat to death in a dream may mean hitting A cat to death in a dream is an end to the worries and sadness that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. In the case of my personal opinion that he was beating the cat to death, this may indicate rejection of a crisis and problem that the dreamer was facing at that time. Killing the cat due to repeated beatings may It indicates the end of the injustice that was on the dreamer’s shoulders in those days, and God knows best. In the case of his personal view of beating the cat to death, this may indicate that he stopped the sin that he was doing at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about beating Satan in the form of a human in In a dream, hitting the devil who was present in human form could indicate the end of the crisis that the dreamer suffered during his life at that time. Whoever dreams that he is hitting the devil, it could indicate the end of the envy or evil that fell upon him in those days. And he struck the devil in a form A human in a dream may indicate getting rid of the presence of evil people in the life of the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about hitting my maid in a dream: A maid hitting the dreamer in a dream may indicate good things that will come to the dreamer during this time. If someone sees the maid hitting him This may indicate that circumstances have changed for the better, thanks to God. In the event that one sees that the maid is hitting him, this may indicate wrong decisions made by the dreamer and he must stop them immediately. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a pig in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is hitting a pig, It may indicate that he will get rid of the hostility that was present in his life in the previous period. Beating a pig in a dream could indicate getting closer to the Blessed and Almighty God, and stopping sins and disobedience.

title: Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: This is because peanuts are a special plant that symbolizes goodness and living, and interpretations vary from one dream to another depending on the details and the marital status of the man and woman. Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream for a single girl. A single girl dreams that she buys a lot of peanuts in a dream. A good sign that he will live a life Full of happiness and joy. It may indicate that he will enter into a successful romantic relationship soon, and God knows best. Seeing peanuts in a dream for an unmarried girl is a metaphor for earning livelihood and the enormous blessing that the dreamer enjoys, and God knows best. As for the only girl who watches herself shelling peanuts In a dream. A sign that he will do hard work soon. But he will do it and after that he will feel comfortable, and God knows best. The appearance of peanuts in an unmarried girl’s dream in a dream is a praiseworthy vision. An indication of the good and good of her condition and that she will hear good news. And if he is looking for work or... He wants to travel, then it is good news that he will get a new job or that he is traveling, and God knows best. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is trying to peel peanuts, and she is unable to do so in the dream. This dream indicates that she cannot make a fateful decision in her life, and God knows best. As for seeing eating spoiled peanuts in an unmarried girl’s dream, it is a sign that he has committed a great sin that he must repent for, and God knows best. See also: Seeing eating peanuts in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman, when she dreams that she is eating A lot of peanuts in a dream. A praiseworthy vision indicates that she will enjoy a happy life with everyone around her and will feel comfortable and reassured, and God knows best. A married woman is suffering from a problem in her life and dreams of shelling peanuts in a dream. It symbolizes liberation from this problem, and getting closer to God. Almighty, and abundant compensation for the dreamer, and God knows best. And if a married woman dreams that she is shelling peanuts for her children in a dream and she is happy. This is a sure sign that the dreamer is doing everything in her power, and is trying to achieve happiness for her children and raise them properly, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman She shells peanuts for her husband in a dream. This dream indicates that she is living a happy and stable married life with her husband. Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream about a man and its meaningWhen a man dreams of seeing himself eating a lot of peanuts in a dream and enjoying it. A praiseworthy vision because it indicates that he will find A prestigious job with a high salary after he became unemployed, and God knows best. And the man who works and dreams that he eats peanuts in a dream. Good news that he will get a big promotion in his job, and God knows best. And the man who dreams that he buys peanuts in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer will get A provision from God Almighty. Jurists and translators have confirmed that the appearance of peanuts in a dream is one of the beautiful visions, because it symbolizes goodness, blessing, and happiness for those who see it. A symbol of hearing good news for the pioneer, good fortune, and

title: Interpretation of seeing blood flow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing blood returning in a dream or a dream via the website visionroy2a.com, vomiting is the reflux of what is in the stomach through the mouth or nose, accompanied by a feeling of nausea with low blood pressure, and it is one of the disturbing sensations for many and the most dangerous and frightening one makes vomiting. Blood because it often accompanies serious diseases and seeing the reflux of blood in a dream is one of the visions that cause fear and panic in the dream and after waking up, and today in this article we mention the most important interpretations provided by major scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Shaheen, so follow along. We.Interpretation of seeing blood coming back in a dream. Seeing blood coming back in a dream is an indication of the return of sins and repentance from sins. Bleeding from the mouth indicating offspring and multiple offspring. Seeing blood falling from the mouth to the ground for the sick person is a sign of the dreamer’s death. The return of blood in a dream is a sign of bad or hurtful words that come. From the monarch to others. Seeing blood bleeding easily and without pain in a dream means forgiveness and forgiveness in the life of the dreamer. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Muzzammil in a dream Interpretation of seeing blood flowing in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says about seeing folds in a dream signifying repentance from sins and returning to God. Seeing the return of blood in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of miscarriage. Red blood in a dream is a sign of the repentant’s sincerity in returning to God. Seeing the return of blood in a dream is an indication of breaking an oath, gossiping, or uttering obscene words. Seeing blood returning in a dream indicates that making changes in the life of the future dreamer. Seeing a lot of blood in a dream means a lot of blood for good, benefits and money that the fortuneteller will receive. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a doll in a dream Interpretation of seeing blood returning in a dream for a single woman Seeing the return of blood in a dream for a single woman indicates changes in her life for the better. Seeing the return of blood in a dream for a single woman A girl’s blood to get rid of bad friends or people who want to harm her. Seeing blood bleeding in a dream means a girl getting rid of the problems, worries and sorrows of her life. Large amounts of blood returned to the girl’s dream is a sign of ample livelihood and a lot of money on her way. Interpretation of seeing blood flowing in a dream for a woman For a married woman, seeing blood flowing again in a dream indicates that she is a married woman, for the news of her pregnancy. Seeing the return of blood for a married woman indicates getting rid of harm around her. If a married woman sees in her dream, someone returning blood, it is an indication that there is someone next to her who wants the bad and the bad for her. Seeing blood bleeding In a dream, it means for a married woman the money and benefits she obtains in her life. Seeing blood flowing in a dream for a married woman indicates repentance from sins and returning to God. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing blood in a dream Interpretation of seeing blood returning in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing the return of a pregnant woman’s blood with a group next to her is a sign They gossip about her behind her back, and she does not care about them. Seeing black blood sparkling in a pregnant woman’s dream means getting rid of fatigue and pain.

title: Interpretation of a black or white stranger chasing you in a dream: A vision of a man chasing you in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an unknown man chasing me for a single girl, for a married woman, a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, if a black young man chases me while I am running away from an unknown person in Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of dreams of a man chasing me in a dream seeing someone chasing you can cause you to feel anxious and this The vision has many different meanings and meanings, and its interpretation can indicate bad or good, and its interpretation varies accordingly, so we learn together about the details during this article. The topic of persecution is more related to women than to men, and men may see it, but fear here is an influential factor, so whoever sleeps afraid This dream cannot be interpreted by anyone who spends the night in it. Anxiety or confusion about something because it is just a passing dream, such as emptying a memory such as for someone who sees her randomly without sleep in a state of fear or anxiety, whether she is pregnant, a virgin girl, married, married or single, will give him an explanation for this. Interpretation of dreams of being chased and chased in a dreamfrom whomever saw For a man, woman, or girl, someone is chasing him in a dream, this indicates a calamity or something that is disturbing the dreamer’s life and he thinks about solving it a lot. His escape is a continuation of his life, and if he is able to escape and hide and lose his pursuer and his safety from them, then he will solve the matter at the appropriate time. Ibn Shirin says: Whoever escapes from a slave and escapes from him, if he does not know him, then he is safe from fear and deception. This indicates that the monarch has lost his way and is looking for solutions to his matter in the wrong way. As for seeing someone quietly following you or walking behind you with a simple, wrong and slow walk, this indicates the amount of inconvenience that the viewer will face if he is unable to know who is following him or confronts the viewer and approaches him in the dream because Getting closer is knowing the real cause of the problem and the beginning of the solution, otherwise his time of suffering will be prolonged. Al-Nabulsi tells us that whoever the young man is pursuing is one of the enemies of the priest, if he knows him and he is pursuing him, and if he does not know him, then he is in trouble or close to disobedience, and he is the priest. He will regret it, and if he catches it, he will fall into it and he will regret it and trouble will arise. It indicates the enemy who has gathered his forces to take revenge on the dreamer, or lose his money, or pursue him with difficulty. Interpretation of a man chasing me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of a man chasing a single woman in a dream, if one sees in the dream that there is a person who loves him and follows him and does not want to harm him. As for seeing someone chasing you In a dream and running away from it, and in his place he was trying to solve a problem, do a job, or start a project, this indicates that the dreamer will achieve what he wants and will overcome it. All the problems and obstacles that he faces. If a person sees in a dream that someone is chasing him but he is not afraid, this means that the dreamer is characterized by leadership and self-confidence, enjoys the trust of those around him, and faces problems and obstacles in his path without caring. If one sees that he was able to escape from his pursuer in a dream, it means that he will be able to reach his goal and overcome his problems and issues that he suffers from in his life. If one sees in a dream that someone he knows well is chasing him, it means that a secret from him has been revealed. Kiss him for the sake

title: What is the interpretation of a dream of intense crying for a single woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about crying for a single woman: Interpretation of a dream about intense crying for a single woman makes her feel fearful and anxious, and here comes the role of dream interpretation scholars who listed many interpretations of this dream, which differed from each other according to the state of crying and its form. Let us learn about all the sayings about her, whether silent or loud. What is the interpretation of a dream of intense crying for a single woman? For an unmarried woman to cry profusely in a dream, if she is on the prayer rug, means she repents for a sin she committed and decides not to return to it. Again. But if she cries in her sleep and her tears fall, it is one of the unwanted visions, warning her of the loss of a loved one, and he may be the one who supports her in life, and she finds herself alone after him. If the visionary is making crying and weeping sounds, it is a missed opportunity or a failure in her life. Either she is in the study stage and cannot pass the exams, or she is old and has failed in an emotional experience she created. It enters her into a severe bout of depression. Interpretation of dreams about crying heartily for an unmarried woman, but without tears, as it is the joy she gets after long periods of sadness, and evidence of her emerging from a psychological depression that recently befell her for some reason. If a girl sees that someone close to her is dying, And she cried over him with a burning heart, then she truly dies and everyone is shocked. If there are disagreements between her and one of her close friends, and she sees in a dream that he cries a lot over her, this means that this friend has been wronged or some evil people have caused a rift between them, and they must apologize to her and try to restore Believers instead of keeping them away from her. If her crying was so intense that it led to a sound of laughter between the tears, but in a hysterical manner, then this expresses a violent shock that she is exposed to and she loses her balance for a while, but she finds someone to support and help her. He stands by her side until she recovers from the shock and improves her condition. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman crying according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said that seeing a girl crying expresses the goodness and happiness that will come to her soon. But if she is of marriageable age and suffers from a lack of marriage offers to the point that she considers herself not Desirable, there is someone who will propose marriage to her soon and has many good qualities that make him a substitute for God (Glory be to Him). ) for this dreamer. If the dreamer is complaining of sadness or anxiety, then there is a major discovery that she will feel soon through which she can deal with the cause of her sadness in a way that makes her get rid of it and replace those reasons with other things. This makes her happier. She also said that her tears indicate her repentance from her heart and her remorse for the past years of her life without doing what pleases God Almighty. What is the interpretation of a dream about crying loudly for an unmarried woman? The loud sound in crying and crying expresses unexpected misfortunes and the separation of those close to them. From the girl's heart, whether the person has been away traveling for a long time or God has died. If the girl has undesirable behaviors and is criticized by many of those who love her and wish her well from family and friends, then...
